event.name: Čau Litva!
event.description: Join us for an unforgettable farewell celebration where Slovenian hearts and Lithuanian souls unite for one last amazing night. After four incredible years of memories in Lithuania, it's time for a special goodbye – with music, laughter, and unforgettable moments that will stay in our hearts forever. Iki kito karto, Lietuva!
